column1: 4.2.4.3.2.6.1	Summary of evidence and recommendations for other treatments for uncomplicated stress   urinary incontinence
Implantation of an artificial sphincter can improve or cure incontinence in women with uncomplicated   SUI.
Implantation of the adjustable compression therapy (ACT®) device may improve uncomplicated SUI.
Complications, mechanical failure and device explantation often occur with both the artificial sphincter   and ACT©.
